original_text: Then the Lord opened the eyes of Balaam, and he saw the angel of the Lord standing in the way, and his sword drawn in his hand: and he bowed down his head, and fell flat on his face.
korean_text: 그 때에 여호와께서 발람의 눈을 밝히시매 여호와의 사자가 손에 칼을 빼들고 길에 선 것을 그가 보고 머리를 숙이고 엎드리니

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord opened the eyes of Balaam
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호와께서 발람의 눈을 뜨게 하시니

sentences.original_text: and he saw the angel of the Lord
and his sword drawn in his hand
and he bowed down his head
and fell flat on his face
